channel.title: SciRep on Atsuya Watanabe's Personal Web-site
channel.description: Recent content in SciRep on Atsuya Watanabe's Personal Web-site

item.description: New paper has been published on SciRep Tensile strength of nanocrystalline FeCoNi medium-entropy alloy fabricated using electrodeposition A. Watanabe, T. Yamamoto, and Y. Takigawa Scientific Reports, 12, 12076 (2022). doi: 10.1038/s41598-022-16086-6

A paper was published on Sci. Rep. Microstructural heterogeneity in the electrodeposited Ni: insights from growth modes I. Matsui, A. Watanabe, Y. Takigawa, N. Omura, T. Yamamoto Sci. Rep., 10, 5548 (2020). doi: 10.1038/s41598-020-62565-z
